name: Dairy.Money MILK
description: Dairy.Money is a new and fun journey in the world of DeFi. We took the best features from the Strong and Olympus Dao models to create our own unique platform. Starting as a DaaS platform, we efficiently aggregate returns from protocol-owned liquidity and returns from DeFi protocols across many chains to allocate rewards and yield to cow owners. By locking a specific amount of MILK tokens into the platform, users gain access to a fixed daily return. This is a launchpad for our own GameFi and Metaverse ecosystem. The platform is going to evolve into a full P2E game, including stake-able and trade-able NFTs. This is how we aim to bring further utility into MILK, so that it won't only be a way to earn earn and get rewards.
